text: "Nova deca" (, ) is a song performed by Serbian group Balkanika. The song was released as a digital download on 11 April 2018. The song was written by Sanja Ilić, Tanja Ilić and Danica Krstić. The song combines the Torlakian dialect of southeastern Serbia with standard Serbian, using a dance beat and fusing traditional vocals and flute with contemporary singing. ==Eurovision Song Contest== The song represented Serbia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal. The song was the Serbian entry in the final of the Eurovision Song Contest, held on 12 May, and finished in 19th place. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! Region ! Date ! Format ! title: Nova deca
